channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- SINUMERIK Edge
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- SINUMERIK Edge

item.title: CVE-2021-42027|2024-08-04T03:22:25.641Z -- siemens -- sinumerik%20edge
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in SINUMERIK Edge (All versions < V3.2). The affected software does not properly validate the server certificate when initiating a TLS connection. This could allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by interfering in the communication path between the client and the intended server.
